BasicSprite

Class QBPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • BasicShapes.Box
      • BasicShapes.BBox
        • BasicSprite.BPlatform

  • public class QBPlatform
extends QBBox
    Platform with bounding box. This type of platform does not contain any animation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QBPlatform()
      Constructor for the platform, originally contains no image.

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Set the image to whatever is passed to us. The width and height will be changed accordingly.
        Parameters:
        image - the image for this platform.

      • loadImage

        public boolean loadImage(java.lang.String path)
        Load the image from a given path.
        Returns:
        true if image loaded successfully, false otherwise.
